message.body: Hearts, stars, and horseshoes! What a busy weekend, followed by a bit of a busy week. Time to relax while I can...still want to do pad thai tonight? :-)
Yes yes, if that works for you! I was just making a shopping list!

So, would it be possible for you to run to west phila? I have found all but one ingredient..... The ever elusive tamarind paste. I know it's at one of those markets (prolly international foods by 7-11), but I'm not sure I have time to run over there....
Aye aye, I can!
Hah, just found it at whole foods. So we're all set! When you wanna head over?
Together, I hope we discover the secrets of a good pad thai. :-) How about six or seven-ish?
I am sure we will! Sounds good!
I am thinking I shall be there around 6:30ish. I'm going to stop off by a market on the way north. :-)
Okey doke!
Hm, if yr still out, could you grab some red curry paste?
Oy! Just got this. I'm outside. Id love to grab some, but my air will need some tires first. I mean, uh...
Heya! You at work? Off soon? I'm in the vicinity.
Haha, and pat says not to call him, he's kaput
Love! I just got home & plugged in my phone...drat, I wish I hadn't missed you!
Rawr. Let's plan another feast day soon!
Jeremy has a show in west Philly tomorrow.... Come! Only $5... I gotcha if you can't scrub it since I'm onda list.
Oooh, onda list! You so VIP. I'm going up to NY tonight and coming back with musical instruments + musical Emma. Gonna try to make it back in time for the show!
Coolio! They're 3rd or 4th, so not on until 11 prolly. 51st and Baltimore. Have good transport times!
Musical Emma still in town? Shall we all convene?
It's a funny thing; I feel like I haven't stopped moving for weeks on end. This message comes to you from a train running alongside the Hudson River. I g
ot your message last night while walking on the Bard College campus; alas, too late to convene!
Heya! It was great to see ya last night. April is the cruellest month for those of us with idea seeds that need a-plantin', but I'm super excited to work w/ you
It's a wasteland to be sure :-). I'll call Zac tonight and try to get this ball rollin'.... Yahoo!
...cooking up deliciousnesses as always. I'm available for coffee/tea design meetings anytime this week before 3pm, woohoo. Gonna drop your lock off after work.
Sweetness. I unfortunately have no before 3 time this week.... So maybe Monday?
Oh goodness, not Monday. Tuesday?
Perfect! Anytime works great.
I'm on a mission to locate a handle of Jim Beam...
...take your time, if you haven't already set out toward the south. It looks like this journey is going to take me into center city. Anything for alcohol!
Oh me oh my, it was so great to see you last night! More + soon = yum. Chances are that my Groupon offer is a dud; I checked OpenTable & found that we're
booked solid until after it expires. Lament!
Awe, thanks for the offer though! Mayhap we shall see each other tonight in any case!

So, I'm goin for Ethiopian food tomorrow.... One of the 4 injeras I have has got to work! I think I have all ingredients.... But if we wanna make baklava, I could use some rosewater and a little extra honey if you have any?
I can do that! I'll see you later on and we can talk details. Injera fest!
Huzzah!
I'm movin' pretty slow today...weekend style. Gonna see if I can find or make some rosewater and then zip over...is 7 too late?
Make it 7:45, forgot I have Spanish class tonight!
Ok ok!
No class! Come by whenever!
Ok!
Fwah, not sure I'll make it, got lots that needs attending to here, but I will try, I will try!
I understand...I should probably be writing and doing laundry myself. :-) but there it is, and so it goes! Last night was a blast.
For sure! One of the very best indeed.
I had a big "doh!" moment when I unpacked my bag and realized that I still have your candles. Oops! Want to do morning/lunch coffee tomorrow or Thurs?
Water Bears + candle return = good karma. :-)
Haha, no probs. I have to work every morning (tear) and won't be back till after 3....(tear tear). Saturday is the first free time I have during daylight hours....
Water Bears on the interwebs! A quick promo placeholder is up. Gonna make time to embellish with support info (reviews, past show media) soon. Details in email!
You are best!!! Thanks!!!
I wonder if we can get a night kite flying club started.
Yes and yes to all things
I nominate him as the puppet news network's weatherman.
What an auspicious start to a day! His forecasts will always be accurate as they will only ever be subjective :-)
Shall we Monday meal time? I was thinking a middle eastern falafel feast? I have the day off, so we should have a website talk as well!
Oh, and I have some deliciousness from Jeremy for you as well
Yay!
Falafel feats + website jam, woohoo! Let's do.
Alright! Just come over whenevs, i'ma make a w phila mornin run then spend the rest of the day making pita!
I am takin' care of weekend odds & ends...specifically trying to find a fountain pen refill & suchlike important life details.
I am thinking I shall be over and done with laundry sometime in the next two hours, and will be swinging your way shortly thereafter. :-)
Okey doke! I think dinner may just be you me and pat but who can say! I will be at home, so come whenever!
After a recovery day full of grownup logistics & not rushing much of anything at all, I'm packing up to head to yours. See you in a few! :-*
Huzzah! We have only a little rum to drink, so if you have anything, that would be swell!
Downstairs I am!
You should request off next Sunday and come to Baltimore for the day with Ed and I, yes oh yes
I say yes, yes yes!
Huzzah!
I have a three day weekend this week! Off all day today, tomorrow, and Wednesday. I was just sitting down to write a snazzy grocery list when I saw your text.
Now I get to write a snazzy grocery list with a picnic in mind. :-)
Yay! I have to think of what to make myself.... Blueberry empanadas are the only thing certain in my life right now :-)
Mmmm ok, I make gazpacho, blueberry empanadas and beet salad!
Ok! I juat found out that the 2nd part of my day unfortunately won't contain bike building, and is completely free for picnicking. :-)
Picnics > bike building. I will begin my feast making around 4!
Like most mondays, I am moving nowhere in a hurry. :-) I am thinking about coming to your house to sear some daikon, cook some forbidden rice, and make pesto...
...but I needs to grab a few ingredients first. Mind if I borrow your lock for a farmstand/whole foods run?
But of course!
I forgot how good gazpacho is and only made 1 batch! If I don't see you before a farmstand run, could you grab me 2 lbs of sweet tomatoes? Gracias!!
The tomato mule is here!
Without tomatoes, unfortunately. But a bike lock can fix that in a jiffy!
I can leave work early & maybe come along on your adventure! Are you still in town?
Ed didn't get the day off, so alas, no one got an adventure today :-(
I wanted to wait until the last last minute to see what would happen (I had a feeling I'd be able to squeak out!)...doh! It's okay; we're still transmodern.
Hah, forever and always!
What is needed for the feast tonight?
I donno! I'm not feeling very much like feasting at all, myself...I'm feeling more introspective than social this weekend.
Hey sir! It's been too long! Wanna make food tomorrow? There will be Germans!
Any chance yr off tonight?
Workin' workin. :-(
It's an early night though; I should be finished soon. What are you up to?
Jeremy and Corey are going to play some strange sounds at the tritone (15th and south), prolly in 45 mins or so....come by after yr finished!
...more like 12, but there is mystic trumpet now!
Sweet! That gives me time to take a trolley adventure across the river. See you @ septa o'clock!
:-). Buena suerte!
Workin tonight? If not, come to dos!
I'm just now finishing up...will you be there for a bit?
Yea!
Think we are headed back to tranny soon if yr still headed here!
Out in the west, if you lovelies feel like lazin'. And yr cape if safe and sound at the trans!
Have you departed for the Hudson yet?
No, my dear! The circus is still in town. Are you back stateside?
Yes indeedy! Oh goods, we'll have hangs real soon. Same-ish schedule for you?
Yes but no! I have a four day weekend this weekend (Sun thru Thurs) and Ems and I are trying to figger out how to spend it. I'd love to see you!
Awersome! I might try to organize a posse to go tubing or summit if yr down, and Monday will prolly head west...if nothing else, let's catch up on Sunday!
Aye aye! Beware the approach of the fourth of july...they're already lighting fireworks down here in s. Philly.
Hoya hoya! I left messages with Mat & Keith...Carlos is still down to go, but I'm going to wait to hear back from the other fellas for a bit.
Ok! Keep me posted!
Still no word from Mat & Keith, my dear...Ems and I are having linner now; I'll keep you updated.
Heh. The best made plans if drunks and men....
Har! So true. But everyone is ready to go, except for those west Philly people! They never want to leave over there, even to go to the beach.
Is so true....and they have the cars, no?
Carlos is close by; want to come over?
I'm a out of the city now for another hour :-(. Have a good trip if yr goin!
We're still here :-(. Don't wait on me...if yr still here when I get back, tits. If not, no worries!
We are still chillin'! There's no rush. Easy like Sunday evening, yo. ;-)
I hope your return to PHL worked out all right! Delaware is a strange state, but Em and I are gonna make the most of it. Let's get together soon!
Emma and I returned to Philly earlier this evening with some awesome beach jam sound recordings I can't wait to share. I hope all is well with you...love!
Yea! Awesome, I can't wait to hear 'em (')! You guys have plans for yr last night of freedom?
Hey love! Want a ride to Tranny tomorrow? I've got some Zipcar errands to run around town...one is to bring you Gordita's lock & some puppet stuffing.
Awesome! I should be back from work by 3....was just gonna go straight over...I'll give you a ring when I'm back in the city!
Hafta go home before heading to the stood....will 4:30 be ok to meet up?
Shure, shure! One of my west philly errands fell through, so I didn't wind up needing to zipcar after all. I still wanna ride your lock & stuffing over, tho!
I wish I had time to help @tranny today, but I have a ton of stuff to do at the house. I can ride the stuffing wherevers ya want it, though!
Awerrrrsome. I'll be home in 15, or do you wanna come to tranny and make things?
Ok! Head over whenevs!
I just returned from the thrift store with a hibachi grill, woohoo! Need to hang some laundry to dry & I'll be on my way...~4:30 it is!
K!
Me is here!!!
Can't do tomorrow morn, but could do Saturday whenever works for you! Let me know!
I don't know what time I'll be going in on Saturday, but it shouldn't be before noon. Let's do it!
Ok, give me a shout Saturday morn!
Aye aye! It might be a late night on Friday, but I'll try to get in touch as early as possible.
Heya! I'm going in @ 2:30 today...when ya wanna meet?
Aye aye!
Whenevs! I'll ring ya in the am
I'm on my way!
dong ding dong
Thanks friend! I hope that's a good sign on yr personal front...and hopefully we can hang again soon!
Heya! Hope all is well. Please check yr email and update website with info asap....basically, just link to the website I built tonight on the front page: waterbearsinspace.weebly.com. Thanks!
Heya; July dealt me some harsh blows from which I'm still recovering. My laptop and phone were stolen on the 28th, causing a full stop on design project
s/communication updates.
I got my phone back in action on Wednesday, and have been working overtime to get a replacement design/production desktop up and running. I should have
your site edits live by the end of today.
Life is a whirlwind, but I'm weathering it. Your bike lock has been retrieved; it's outside Shear Perfection with the key tucked inside. Sorry for not up
dating you sooner; damn July sucker punches made it impossible.

:-(. So sorry to hear...my messages weren't meant as admonishments, only updates, I couldn't put off the press releases any longer. I had sent you a msg about the lock but guess you didn't get it....thanks! And hope that is a good sign for you and the l
Heya! Any chance yr free on Saturday? Wanted to have a thank you time for those who have helped on the show!
Hows tricks? Around at all this week/end?
It was the best of times, it was the worst of times...this has been a very challenging time. My phone/text/email situation is back in action. Communicati
on problems have made it hard to be ambitious, so I've been meditating on healing & thinking about the future. I feel out of sync w/ the show; howsit?
I donno when you sent your message; my phone died last week and I just got a replacement. Oh, life. I would like to give you a hug soon. Hugs= good.

I'm glad yr reachable again...I'm sorry I haven't been reaching out more, and wish I could have helped, but i'm completely drowned in water bears. Maybe we can catch up soon? I'm going into tech next week, but maybe could meet some time before then. Wh
I go back to work on Monday, but I'm free anytime before then. When can I help? It's good for me to stay busy & I want my new work sched. to have room for WBIS.

When do you work on mon? I could use a hand then from 11-2 or so. If you wanna come over for relaxing painting/hang times before then, I'll be there after 10 tonight and tomorrow, and after 2 Saturday and Sunday. Beer, trees, and an ear always there.
Heyyo! You're at tranny, yes? If so, I shall ride over and help make!
Ok! Is there anyone there, or should I hang out at the casa for a little while longer?
Awesome. I'm running an errand, Will be back in an hour at The latest!
We will be back by 11, noone there now.
I could pioneer the sport of extreme puppetyranny by biking over right now.
Haha. We're in rehearsal till 2!
Heya! Hope you can make it out to the show this week! And if yr around any night, I'm seeing a slew of shows/free stuff at the festival bar every night!
Hey love! I've been slowly maneuvering through a bit of a tricky life passage, but I think the storms have passed. I'd love to see the show! How about Weds?
I'm in a bit of a vacation -induced financial drought, so haven't been highly social. I loved the inquirer writeup on WBIS, by the way. :-)
Thx! Wed sounds great!
Can I bring the Snowball and record a soundtrack? :-)
Yea!
Are you working tonight fine sir?
No m'lady, I'm busily installing a projector @ mo casa. How you, how are things, what news?
Oy, well was gonna see if you wanted to catch up, but I'm home now and bikeless until tomorrow, but we should soon!
Heya! When are you free this week? Let's see one another!
I'm free right now, & almost all of tomorrow. Want to come over and make some food? I have naan & pizza dough ready to go. :-)
Me miss you very very much. I've been blind & super busy; finally picked up my glasses today, woohoo! John mentioned a show... what do you know about mag
ic beans? ;-)

Yea yea! Well, I have been working in show every night, and won't be free till it's done...we only have two shows, Friday and Saturday. You should come! And then next week let's have food/friend times.
Oh! And would yr projector happen to be free for Friday and Saturday? We need another one it would seem...
Next week I'm in NY Mon thru Thursday; It's a long story but hopefully one with a happy ending. I'll be working Fri, Sat, & Sun nights both this week & n
YES. 77 inches of wonder !
Yea! We'll do that movie all awesome then the week following next
Projector is free! What's your day like tomorrow? We can do projector business + lunch pleasure; I'll bring it and any necessary cables to ya.
So is possible for borrow?
Yes! I'm free after 11, shall I come yr way? Or meet for fancy feast somewhere? My treat!
My roomies are saying we should meet @ morning glory; 10th & fitzwater. What say you?
Yea, it's yums. Or carmens cunt-ry kitchen at 11th and...something southish. Which is also rad. Yr pick!
I'll be at carmen's @ 11, see ya whenever you get there & we'll figure the rest out. :-)
(sorry for the late text; I got caught up in time, reviewing audio recordings from earlier this year.)
Can we do noon? I need to check out a thrift store for some props after my work meet
Aw damn carmen's is closed today. Morning glory it is!
Circumstances will probably prevent me from returning the projector tonight. I can just bring it to movie night on tues, or Sunday/Monday if need be!
Want me to drop off projector tonight? If not, I can bring it on Wednesday!
Couldn't understand a single word of yr message unfortunately. Call or txt back!
Heyu! Birthday/feast day times this week? Was gonna celebrate feast day with nora on Friday maybe if yr free then!
FEASTING TIME! I'll be "working" @ Marigold on Friday night; I'm on a mission for this year to be the last ever that the restaurant biz steals me from friends.
Bwah. No good.
I know! Worst news ever. But it's for the last time ever! I miss ya & can't wait til we get to lounge/create together soon; when's the next upholstery cd party?
Aye aye! Stay warm and well and dry and give that charming man a hug for me.
It's on December 7th! at L'etage, a cool theatre on Bainbridge! let's connect soon, enjoy the 'gold.
Happiest of will days for ya!
WARM FUZZIES: looks like I'll be in your 'hood tonight around 6. But! Looks like yer busy playing music or learning another language or something.
Jeez. Why ya gotta be such a rock star?
Yes yes, I know. Wah! I'm rehearsing for our Spanish show next Wednesday. Sorry to miss ya!
Is ok; I'll be there @ the show for sure That should make up for the pain in this absence-fond heart . :-)
Huzzah! Only you will only see señor papos there, so we'll have to have times together soon as well!
Working tomorrow?
I just found out I'm going in @ 4pm. :-( what does Thursday look like for ya?
I have Spanish, but free after that! We are having a potato party tomorrow tho :-( I am sorry you cannot come and eat all the potatoes.
Working tonight?
I was... now I'm @ Inciting (spelling?) on a random adventure. Where yas?
I am here at inciting!
Ha!
Where are you!
In the upstairs dancefloor. Help me! It's dark in here & someone just drew a shooting star on my arm. Tell me where I can find & hug you!
Have you ever been to a waterfall in New York state?
I have indeed. Are you visiting one?
